Directions: Use the information to answer each question that follows.
Content: People sometimes feel tired after eating. Students research the ways the body responds during the digestion process. A reliable website describes several steps in this process in order:
2. These hormones dilate blood vessels that lead to the digestive system.
3. Blood pressure starts to drop as more blood flows to the digestive system.
4. The heart pumps faster, and blood vessels in other parts of the body constrict.
The students decided to investigate the responses of body systems to eating a meal. They selected five subjects to participate in their investigation.
For each subject, the students collected several kinds of data:
• heart rate and blood pressure before meal
• heart rate and blood pressure after meal
• whether subject is male or female
